extendedInfo.description: Kids Finger Paint!  No ads.  Easy color wheel.  Shake to clear.  Share with family.  Colorful, seasonal backgrounds.We designed this game with young children in mind, and hope you and they enjoy it!Kids Paint Instructions:1)  Touch the color wheel to pick a paint color, brush, or background.  To pick random colors, touch the ? button.2)  Touch the Back key to undo mistakes.3)  A few shakes back and forth will clear the screen.4)  Touch the Menu key, then Share.  The painting is saved to your gallery and you are given the option to share via email, Facebook, & more!Some Ideas For How Your Kids Can Use Kid's Finger Paint:â¢  Play "I draw, you draw".â¢  Pick a planet or space background and add a rocket ship!â¢  Add flowers, birds, and trees to a scene with sun rays.â¢  Practice identifying and writing letters and numbers.â¢  Just have fun doodling whatever comes to mind.Other Kids Paint Notes:â¢  The screen won't lock until five minutes after your last paint stroke.Please enjoy the best finger paint game for kids!-- The development team at Cogito Games

reviews.title: Kids love it.
reviews.comment: Great application generally. It does need more colours and an exit button though. But yeah, kids love it.
reviews.author: Mr. Bozack

reviews.title: The best!
reviews.comment: Like the new pics!  My 3 year old loves it!  It\'s easy n fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good time-killer
reviews.comment: My 3-yr old loves it. My suggestions for improvements:  Make the little colour circle and  require a double-tap to bring up, to reduce accidental activation. Similarly limit the access to the sharing function.  The extra backgrounds are much appreciated, the Christmas tree is a new favourite.
reviews.author: Robin Cooper

reviews.title: Very kid friendly! Mny wayz to share
reviews.comment: Very user and kid friendly! Ez share. I appreciate its simplicity. Samsung.
